    • Uses of Node.Controller in ray.rage.scene

      Methods in ray.rage.scene that return Node.Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node.Controller SceneManager.getController(int index)
      Gets the controller at the specified index, based on the order in which they were added.
      Methods in ray.rage.scene that return types with arguments of type Node.Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<Node.Controller> SceneManager.getControllers()
      Lets the caller iterate over all the controllers owned by this manager.
      Methods in ray.rage.scene with parameters of type Node.Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SceneManager.addController(Node.Controller ctrl)
      Adds the specified controller to this scene-manager.

    • Uses of Node.Controller in ray.rage.scene.controllers

      Classes in ray.rage.scene.controllers that implement Node.Controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractController
      An abstract, package-private, implementation of a Node.Controller.
      class  OrbitController
      A Node.Controller implementation that makes controlled nodes orbit another target node.
      class  RotationController
      A Node.Controller implementation that makes controlled nodes rotate about an arbitrary local axis.
      class  ScalingController
      A Node.Controller implementation that scales controlled nodes.
      class  TranslationController
      A Node.Controller implementation that translates controlled nodes.

      A Node.Controller implementation that uses linear interpolation (i.e.
